# README

https://github.com/test-unit/test-unit-rr

## Name

test-unit-rr

## Description

test-unit-rr is a RR adapter for test-unit.

You don't need RR setup codes with test-unit-rr. You just require
"test/unit/rr".

## Install

    % gem install test-unit-rr

## Usage

    require "test/unit/rr"

contributed patches.)
